MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G53 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Kempsthorn Crescent and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.10pm. Our engineers are carrying out further network investigations to establish the reason for the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.10pm on Wednesday 23rd December 2020.
